title: My Cross

tokens.lyric: Who can I go to for my help to bear my heavy cross?

lines.raw: [G]Who can I go to for my help to bear my heavy cross?

tokens.lyric: Has not the Lord been helping me before I ever knew?

lines.raw: [C]Has not the Lord been helping me before I ever knew?

tokens.lyric: Because I had no strength to bear the load He gave to me,

lines.raw: [G]Because I had no strength to bear the load He gave to me,

tokens.lyric: Six thousand yeas of blood was shed, the thorny path prolonged.

lines.raw: [Em]Six thousand yeas of blood was shed, the thorny path prolonged.

tokens.lyric: I will shoulder now the cross, and pledge I shall endure;

lines.raw: [Am7]I will shoulder now the cross, and pledge I shall endure;

tokens.lyric: Far beyond Golgotha's pain, now hear the victory.

lines.raw: [D]Far beyond Golgotha's pain, now hear the victory.

tokens.lyric: The Lord would never give to me a cross I could not bear.

lines.raw: [G]The Lord would never give to me a cross I could not bear.

tokens.lyric: If I give all the strength I have I shall achieve the goal.

lines.raw: [C]If I give all the strength I have I shall achieve the goal.

tokens.lyric: I sacrifice to do His will, no trial I cannot bear.

lines.raw: [G]I sacrifice to do His will, no trial I cannot bear.

tokens.lyric: I give my life to go this way, no one can turn me back.

lines.raw: [Am7]I give my life to go this way, no one can turn me back.

tokens.lyric: Our Father always persevered to see His will be done,

lines.raw: [D7]Our Father always persevered to see His will be done,

tokens.lyric: If all His children join the task it soon will be achieved.

lines.raw: [G]If all His children join the task it soon will be achieved.

tokens.lyric: If not, the lonely years of strife will all have been in vain.

lines.raw: [C]If not, the lonely years of strife will all have been in vain.

tokens.lyric: No matter what, in fighting on, we'll win eternal joy.

lines.raw: [G]No matter what, in fighting on, we'll win eternal joy.
